description: An ultra-comfortable short to wear anytime and anywhere, the Veza is just as suited for impromptu hikes as it is for impromptu, jet lag naps. Comfy but with a polished design, these bottoms feature an encased elastic waistband, slip-in hand pockets, and an invisible zipper stash pocket for on-the-fly functionality. The Veza’s nylon/spandex fabric blend makes for a sturdy but mobile short you’ll want to wear everywhere, even if you’re keeping it close to home.
name: Cotopaxi Veza Adventure Shorts - Mens
